extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to open pages and links by any external browser (Cloned IE View based on WebExtensions-based)

config_ieapp_label_before.message: Path to the Executable of the External Browser:

config_ieargs_label_before.message: Command Line Arguments for External Browser:

config_contextMenu_label.message: Add "Open by IE" items to the context menu

config_onlyMainFrame_label.message: Only check URL which is shown in location bar

config_forceielist_caption.message: Websites to be opened by IE always

config_closeReloadPage_label.message: Close blank tab left after redirection

config_sitesOpenedBySelf_caption.message: Exceptive websites (opened in this browser directly)

config_logRotationTime_label.message: Rotate log file by specified hour

config_talkAlarmMinutes_label.message: Sync with Talk server for every N minutes
